attributes.description: Configuration data to be passed to the component.

attributesLastModified.description: Last date-time when the attributes for this block were modified, in ISO-8601 format.

id.description: Id taken from the CAPI url

layoutWidth.description: How the component should be presented in the article page according to the column layout system

path.description: Repository for the code of the component in the format "[github org]/[github repo]/[component name]".

versionRange.description: Semantic version of the code of the component, e.g. "^0.3.5".
